sources.title: The Crusader
sources.description: Title: The Crusader Summary: Gangsters scheme to get rid of a crusading District Attorney by blackmailing him through his daughter. Directed by: Frank R. Strayer Actors: Production Company: Larry Darmour Productions Release Date: 5 October 1932 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Gangsters scheme to get rid of a crusading District Attorney by blackmailing him through his daughter.

sources.title: The Crusader (1932) NED SPARKSüçï EVELYN BRENTüçïPRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Director: Frank R. Strayer
Stars: Evelyn Brent, H.B. Warner, Marceline Day, Ned Sparks

A crusading newspaper reporter battles corruption and scandal, risking everything to expose the truth. This gripping story reflects the classic themes of heroism and integrity in the face of overwhelming odds.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

metadata.Plot: Gangsters scheme to get rid of a crusading District Attorney by blackmailing him through his daughter.
metadata.Writer: Edward T. Lowe Jr., Wilson Collison
metadata.Actors: Evelyn Brent, H.B. Warner, Lew Cody
